snippet.title: Solium Infernum - Official Cinematic Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
THE STRATEGY GAME FROM HELL 

Available now on Steam @ https://bit.ly/solium-infernum

Prepare yourself for Solium Infernum, the grand strategy game of politics, intrigue and betrayal, set in the ultimate arena of Hell. The great Dark Majesty is missing from their throne, and the feverish Conclave demands a replacement declared.

As a powerful fallen Archfiend, sinister overlord of the Infernal Kingdom of Hell, you are a contender during the Great Trial of the Throne. Command your dread legions, order your praetors, cast sinister rituals, and outplay your rivals to become Hell’s new Dark Majesty.

UNRELENTING STRATEGY 

In your path to victory stands the hellish red tape of Pandaemonium, Hell’s capital, strict codes and laws that govern and control the Fallen. This isn’t your standard strategy game: in Hell, you also must wage war through bureaucracy. You’ll need to navigate the Conclave’s labyrinthine political systems, rife with betrayal, bluffing and deceit, in order to realise your plans.

Solium Infernum is a simultaneous turn-based strategy game for up to six players that will test the limits of your strategy, cunning and political acumen. To ascend the Dark Throne requires nerves of steel and a true heart of darkness. Put your mind - and your friendships - to the test!

A CULT CLASSIC RESURRECTED

Originally inspired by Milton’s epic poem, Paradise Lost, League of Geeks’ (known for seminal digital board game Armello) sophomore title is a re-imagining and modernisation of Vic Davis’ critically acclaimed cult-classic of the same name, hailed as a masterpiece of strategy game design. 

Once again, prepare to lose yourself within ‘the cold glory of a difficult decision’ as we resurrect Solium Infernum from the depths of Hell. 

Follow the Solium Infernum Twitter: https://twitter.com/soliuminfernum 
Join the League of Geeks Discord: https://discord.gg/V67DGn6sQp
#soliuminfernum #strategygames #gaming #games #gametrailers #cinematictrailers 

Original soundtrack composed by Michael Allen.
